thread.title: AtWork Group Makes Top 200+ Franchise List
thread.title_full: AtWork Group Makes Top 200+ Franchise List

author: Heather Ripley
title: AtWork Group Makes Top 200+ Franchise List
text:
AtWork Group , a top U.S. multi-specialty staffing franchisor, was recognized for the third year in a row as one of the largest franchise companies, based on worldwide sales, and featured on the Top 200+ Franchise Times list. Among the 500 franchise companies listed, AtWork Group was ranked at number 257, up 11 places from last year. “Receiving recognition from a media and industry authority such as Franchise Times is a true testament to our business philosophy,” said Jason Leverant, president and chief operating officer for AtWork Group. “We believe that each franchisee should make ownership decisions without feeling restricted by corporate office, while still receiving top level training and unlimited operational support and expertise.”
AtWork Group is one of only 21 brands listed on the Top 200+ list for a business services offering. A leader in the staffing industry, its cutting-edge solutions and initiatives for franchisees, clients and employees helped the company expand to more than 80 locations throughout the U.S. with gross sales of more than $200 million.
“Last year alone, we have grown from 50 to 80 locations in the U.S.,” said Leverant. “With our continued focus on sales activities and operational excellence, we are honored to receive this prestigious ranking for a third year in a row.”
In addition to the Top 200+ listing, AtWork Group was recently ranked No. 349 on Entrepreneur Magazine’s 2015 “Franchise 500” list, earned a position on the Staffing Industry Analysts Largest U.S. Staffing Firms List on multiple occasions, ranked for the second year in a row on INC.’s list of the 5000 fastest growing U.S. private companies and became a third-time recipient of the prestigious Inavero award that recognizes proven track records of exceptional performance and client satisfaction.
For more information on Atwork Group and national franchise business opportunities, visit http://atworkfranchise.com/
About AtWork Group
AtWork Group is an award-winning and nationally-known franchisor of staffing services including AtWork Personnel Services, AtWork Medical Services, AtWork HelpingHands Services, and AtWork Search Group under the umbrella of the AtWork Group. The foundation for AtWork began in the 1980s, and today, AtWork has grown to be cited as one of Staffing Industry Report’s top U.S. staffing firms. AtWork Group’s remarkable growth is fueled by the vision of founders John and Glenda Hall: think ahead, create opportunity, give exceptional support to franchise offices, and always look for the better way, every day. For more information, visit http://www.atwork.com or call 800.383.0804.
